bibl.title: Letter from Juan Guiteras to Henry Rose Carter, March 4, 1917

div1.p: Guiteras sends Carter a copy of his extensive report to Gorgas concerning a Barbados epidemic.

div1.head: Letter from Juan Guiteras to Henry Rose Carter, March 4, 1917
div1.opener:
Y. F. Guiteras
Barbados
Report.
DR. JUAN GUITERAS
HOSPITAL “LAS ANIMAS”
HABANA
---
March 4th/17
My dear Carter,
div1.p:
I send you
copy of my report on the Barbados
epidemic. I believe you will
understand it notwithstanding
the faulty copy from my M.S.
You don't have to return it.

In a few days I shall
send you the charts. These you
will please return.
